name: Ragnarok (Marcus Gleeson)
description:
Made by Marcus Gleeson,John Heaphey,Ruairi.

A 2d side scroller, that is based on norse mythology. Battle through the cataclysmic destruction of the cosmos as you try to fight the prophecies of Ragnarok as Thor, Odin or Heimdallr against the fiercest enemies of Asgard.
